comments.raw_text:
This is caused (in at least one case) by the fact that certdb_SaveSingleProfile returns SECFailure without calling PORT_SetError.

I believe the rule is that any function exported by NSS must call PORT_SetError before returning SECFailure. I think there are probably many instances of this general problem and I'm not sure if each one should have its own bug report. I am just reporting this one as I ran across it while investigating other bugs.
comments.creator: brian@briansmith.org
comments.author: brian@briansmith.org
